sentences.sContent: Another of the Beach Club’s plus points is that it’s right in the middle of town.
sentences.sCn: 海滩俱乐部的另一个优点是它就位于城中心。

sentences.sContent: This is not an exciting car to drive, but on the plus side it is extremely reliable.
sentences.sCn: 这辆车开起来不刺激，不过从好的方面来说它非常可靠。

phrases.pCn: (高尔夫球比赛中强者对弱者的)让一分，让一击

remMethod.val: 加上(plus)这些的话就太多了(plenty)

trans.tranCn: 表示加的，正的；附加的；有增益的
trans.tranOther: used to talk about an advantage or good feature of a thing or situation
used to show that one number or amount is added to another

trans.tranCn: 加号， 正号； 有利因素
